analysis.description:
SunriseTokenSale.fallback (/unique_chucks/36/0x8ec8c10ee373499ba69c49e757d105a8043e8f27.sol#452-474) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenReward.transfer(msg.sender,tokensToSend) (/unique_chucks/36/0x8ec8c10ee373499ba69c49e757d105a8043e8f27.sol#471)

SunriseTokenSale.WithdrawTokens (/unique_chucks/36/0x8ec8c10ee373499ba69c49e757d105a8043e8f27.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenReward.transfer(beneficiary,amount) (/unique_chucks/36/0x8ec8c10ee373499ba69c49e757d105a8043e8f27.sol)
SafeMath.assert (function @ /unique_chucks/36/0x8ec8c10ee373499ba69c49e757d105a8043e8f27.sol#66-75) shadows built-in symbol "assert"

UpgradeAgent.originalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/36/0x8ec8c10ee373499ba69c49e757d105a8043e8f27.sol#228)
